nodes.bodyText: Did you mean to keep this debug output? If you want to see what was in the cache in the failing case, it might be preferable to extract the whole map and then assert its size with a matcher - this should result in the map contents being included in the failure message.
Can we have comments so that we know which implementation classes this reflection is designed to act upon?
